raw_comment:
1. I notice that a higher percentage of both men and women send texts to communicate with their parents.
2. I wonder how close the parents live to them to those who visit in person
3. This impacts me as I am a senior in high school and have yet to attend college, where I will not be living with my parents.
4. Say Hello: How Often Young Adults Communicate With Their Parents
ace_sentences: A higher percentage of men send texts to communicate with their parents.
A higher percentage of women send texts to communicate with their parents.
I wonder how close the parents live to the young adults who visit their parents in person.
I am a senior in high school.
I have not attended college yet.
In college, I will not live with my parents.
The headline is: Say Hello: How Often Young Adults Communicate With Their Parents.
